headline: CNN Live Event/Special
subHeadline: CNN Celebrates The Fourth of July In America With Cari Champion And Victor Blackwell; U.S. Celebrates July 4th Holiday. Aired 12-1a ET

utterances.speaker: VICTOR BLACKWELL, CNN ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: You know what, I remember as a kid going to the Inner Harbor in Baltimore with my family and being a kid and feeling the fireworks. I've said, you know, people like the drone shows and that's great, but I like -- you can feel it in your chest. And you can feel that boom and we're starting to -- we're expecting to see the fireworks pretty soon from barges here across the bay.This is the perfect setting, it's chilled a little bit which is why we have jackets on out here on the water.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Just a scooch.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: We've been here during the day. The families out enjoying each other here along the water. It's been a great evening here and we've had some great performances and more performances coming.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: We had Demi Lovato, that was amazing. Zac Brown band, that was amazing. We can -- people are starting a little at a time.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Here we go.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Are we getting ready? I see it is time, guys.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: The big day boom.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: The San Diego fireworks continue. What a special show and Darius Rucker, what a special performer. He will give us another song, we're going to take a quick break and we will be right back from Coronado Island.(COMMERCIAL BREAK)

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Happy Fourth of July, still Fourth of July here on the West Coast. We're back in San Diego where the fireworks are still popping and the music is still playing and of course, it is all live right here on CNN.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: I hear you, barge, I hear you.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: I mean, everybody's blowing their horns here, the families are cheering. And you know what, this is what I love about firework shows, is I was hearing the families cheer, not just the kids, but the families is that this is a moment that the wonderment is shared by kids and adults and all ages.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Yes, of all ages.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: So, that's what I really love about these firework shows is that the awe the kids feel, it's one of those few moments where you share that with adults.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Yes, and I want to -- I want to focus on that, the kids feel because it makes the kid in us remember what Fourth of July meant for us.When I was a kid, I didn't do the big -- I didn't have the moment where I can go to the bay like you did or the area in Baltimore. But we would get these fireworks and we do them safely in front yard and at home. And it was something that was to behold, it was a special moment. And that's how you are describing what we're watching right now. And it's very special.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: I mean, San Diego did not disappoint.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: It did not.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: They build themselves as the biggest on the West Coast, one of the biggest and best in the country. And they live up to it tonight. A fantastic show here.Listen, more music coming and more fireworks. Coming up, Duran Duran performs Hungry Like the Wolf and other hits and fireworks in Houston. And for the first time, Alaska on this show. What a Fourth in America. It is not over yet.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Happy Fourth of July everyone and they say -- they say what happens in Vegas stays in Vegas but not tonight.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Not tonight.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: That is called the Sphere, it's a new attraction on the Vegas Strip and this is the first time that you can see that it is fully lit. How beautiful is that?And listen to this. I want you to understand, Vegas doesn't normally do this. This is a moment for us. There are a lot of lights there, right? What do you think?

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yes, they deemed everything to show that. You know if you have a national party and we're focusing on the West Coast, you've got to go and focus on what Vegas has to offer. And we're seeing for the first time the Sphere illuminated.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: It's beautiful.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: It's beautiful.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: It's gorgeous. There it is again, you guys. That's a special site to be hold. I'm actually going to Vegas, I know you didn't asked. I'm going to Vegas on Friday. I'll see if they can run this back for me.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Just for you?

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Yes, just to see if they want to.

utterances.speaker: CARI CHAMPION, CNN ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: Wow, take a look at that. The band currently on their Future Past tour, Duran Duran, rocking the crowd here in Northern California. Might be a little more chilly up there, guys.Coming up next, guess what we have? Fireworks from the 49th state. Alaska. It's a first for our July 4th coverage. You're going to enjoy it, and it's next, along with more music from Smash Mouth.

utterances.speaker: VICTOR BLACKWELL, CNN ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: Wow, look at that.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: It's beautiful. It is a beautiful sight to behold.(COMMERCIAL BREAK)

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: San Francisco joining the party now. Beautiful colors over the San Francisco Bay there in Northern California, the biggest fireworks show in Northern California. Still going strong.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: It's a beautiful sight to behold. And I also want to talk to about what we're going to do next, because it's never been done before.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: I'm looking forward to this.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: OK. Have you been to Alaska before, ever?

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: No.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: For work, on assignment, for fun?

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: No, no. I've not been.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Well, I'm going to take you.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: I'm ready.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: You're prepared. We're also watching the fireworks there in Alaska as we dive into more music from Smash Mouth, performing on their underground set (ph).

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Live look at San Francisco, fireworks still going in Northern California and Alaska.Let's go back to Seward. This is the first year that Alaskan fireworks show has been part of FOURTH IN AMERICA. You know, they say, Hey, all coming out to the West Coast -- CHAMPION: Yes.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: -- you need to come a little farther West.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Come farther West.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Come see what we have.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: What a great idea, and it was beautiful. I'm glad we did that. That was something special.I'll tell you what. We have a party boat out here in San Diego. We just missed it. We showed it to them for just a moment.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Just a second.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: They have the right idea, because it's still pretty early here. There we go. Well, that's not the boat, per se. There's a few of them out here. But people are enjoying themselves, and the celebration continues.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Although the fireworks ended here in San Diego, the party is still going on. There have been a few boats that have passed by with people dancing and singing. So the celebration of America's birthday does not end.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Does not end. Still ongoing. What do we have next

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: An extraordinary night on this Fourth of America. Another look at San Diego. And I got to share it with you, Cari Champion.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Thank you so much for having me. I had a great time.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: This was fun.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: It was really a lot of fun.
